code:
/**
 * Contract Service - API calls for contract management
 */const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5001/api';class ContractService{async getAuthHeaders(){const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)};}async handleResponse(response){const contentType=response.headers.get('content-type')||'';// If response is JSON, parse it.
if(contentType.includes('application/json')){const data=await response.json();if(!response.ok){throw new Error(data.message||"HTTP error! status: ".concat(response.status));}return data;}// For non-JSON responses (HTML/text), return text body for better error messages
const text=await response.text();if(!response.ok){// try to extract useful message from HTML (strip tags)
const stripped=text.replace(/<[^>]+>/g,'').trim();const message=stripped?stripped:"HTTP error! status: ".concat(response.status);throw new Error(message);}// If OK but not JSON, return raw text
return{success:true,data:text};}// Contract Management
async getContracts(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();const url="".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts").concat(queryString?"?".concat(queryString):'');const response=await fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async getContract(id){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/").concat(id),{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async createContract(contractData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(contractData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async updateContract(id,contractData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/").concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(contractData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async updateContractStatus(id,statusData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/").concat(id,"/status"),{method:'PATCH',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(statusData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}// Contract Templates
async getContractTemplates(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();const url="".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-templates").concat(queryString?"?".concat(queryString):'');const response=await fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async getContractTemplate(id){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-templates/").concat(id),{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async createContractTemplate(templateData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-templates"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(templateData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async generateDocumentFromTemplate(templateId,generateData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-templates/").concat(templateId,"/generate"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(generateData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}// Contract Documents
async getDocumentCategories(){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents/categories"),{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async getContractDocuments(contractId){let params=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();const url="".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents/").concat(contractId).concat(queryString?"?".concat(queryString):'');const response=await fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async getDocument(id){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents/document/").concat(id),{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}async createDocument(documentData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(documentData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async updateDocument(id,documentData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents/").concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(documentData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async createDocumentVersion(id){let versionData=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contract-documents/").concat(id,"/create-version"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(versionData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}// Workflow & Reviews
async submitForReview(contractId,reviewData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/").concat(contractId,"/submit-review"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(reviewData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}async addReview(contractId,reviewData){const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/").concat(contractId,"/reviews"),{method:'POST',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders(),body:JSON.stringify(reviewData)});return this.handleResponse(response);}// Statistics
async getContractStats(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();const url="".concat(API_BASE,"/contracts/stats").concat(queryString?"?".concat(queryString):'');const response=await fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:await this.getAuthHeaders()});return this.handleResponse(response);}}const contractService=new ContractService();export default contractService;
